name: Blocky Football
description:
Grab your cleats and run like a beast in a fresh, fun football runner!

Dodge the D, score a TD, kick the PAT.
How high can you score?

FEATURES
• Easy to play football fun
• Retro style blocky graphics
• Lots of characters
• Different playing fields & weather effects
• Compete with friends
• Share your #Replay
